detail_desc: Wide, straight-cut sports top in fast-drying functional fabric. Loose fit with a round, slightly wider neckline, short sleeves, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fully lined halterneck swimsuit in textured fabric with a V-neck and a plastic fastener at the back of the neck.
Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a resort collar, French front and straight-cut hem.
Loose-fitting, pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.

Super push-up bra in microfibre with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage, Adjustable shoulder straps, a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back and elasticated ribbing at the hem. Designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Short, fitted dress in ribbed cotton jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Lined bandeau bikini top with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and lightly padded cups with removable inserts. No fasteners.
T-shirt in lightweight jersey with a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Slim-fit jeans in washed stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and legs that flare gently at the hem. Wide ribbing at the waist for optimum comfort.

Long dress in airy chiffon with pleats at the top and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Seam at the waist with a short gathered frill and decorative narrow ties at the sides. Gathered, draped skirt.
Headband in a soft rib knit with a decorative knot detail at the front. Width approx. 11 cm.

Shirt in a patterned viscose and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Short dress in a sturdy weave with a V-neck, 3/4-length puff sleeves and a concealed zip in the side. Unlined. The dress is made partly from Tencel™ lyocell.
Knee-length swim shorts in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket with a hook and loop fastening. Mesh inner shorts.
Yoga socks with crossover elastic straps at the top and anti-slip protectors on the soles.
Triangle bikini top with lined cups, removable inserts and narrow, adjustable straps. Gathered elastication with a small frill trim at the hem and a metal fastener at the back.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.
Vest tops in soft organic cotton slub jersey with gathered frills around the armholes.
Long-sleeved, turtleneck top in lustrous jersey with a heavy drape, pleats on one shoulder and on the sleeves adding to the draped effect, and concealed elastic at the sides of the hem.
Set with a hat and tube scarf in soft faux shearling. The hat has a large faux fur pompom on top.
Top in softly draping, ribbed jersey with a sheen. V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and a lace trim at the top.
Double-layered hat in ribbed cotton jersey with a small appliqué on the front.
Flip-flops with rubber straps and soles.
Knee-length, pleated skirt in an airy weave containing glittery threads with an elasticated waist. Satin lining.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed cotton jersey with overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem.

Short, wide dress in patterned chiffon with a mandarin collar, opening at the top and ties at the neckline. Gathered yoke at the back, long puff sleeves and cuffs with covered buttons. Gathered seam at the waist and hem with a wide flounced trim. Satin lining.
Fitted top in soft jersey with long sleeves and concealed elastication in the sides for optimum fit over the tummy.
Gilet in soft faux fur with a concealed button at the top. Lined.
Short-sleeved tops in soft jersey with gathers in the sides for best fit over the tummy. The cotton content of the tops is organic.
Leggings in soft, striped, organic cotton jersey with wide foldover ribbing at the waist and ribbed hems.
Trenchcoat in soft Tencel™ lyocell twill with a loose yoke front and back, pockets in the side seams, a detachable tie belt at the waist and a single back vent. Unlined.
Wide jumper in a soft knit containing some wool with a hood, kangaroo pocket, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Imitation leather sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a hook and loop fastening, a grosgrain foot strap with a text print, and a loop at the back. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Padded jacket in a quilted weave with a slight sheen. Stand-up collar, a padded, detachable hood with a faux fur trim and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Front pockets with a press-stud, a sleeve pocket with a flap and press-stud, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Lined.

LOVE STORIES x H&M. Pyjamas with a blouse and pair of shorts in a cotton weave. Blouse with a small stand-up collar and gathers and concealed press-studs at the top of the front. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and frill trim at the hems.
Jumper in a fine knit with ribbing around the neckline and hem, and long sleeves with ribbed roll edges.
Sunglasses with metal frames, plastic details and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Hat in soft, rib-knit wool.
Top in sturdy, printed sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Trainers in cotton canvas with a padded edge, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
Trousers in a crêpe weave with a high, elasticated paper bag waist with a drawstring, discreet pockets in the side seams and tapered legs.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Top with a small bow at the neckline and short, flounced sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated waist and gathered frills at the hems.
Trainers in imitation leather with an embroidered motif, a lightly padded edge and tongue, and lacing at the front. Jersey linings, canvas insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
Knee-length cardigan in a soft, loose knit with long raglan sleeves and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No fasteners.
Long-sleeved top in soft fabric with motifs and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Pyjamas with a strappy top and shorts in soft satin with lace details. Top with a V-neck and narrow adjustable shoulder straps. Shorts with narrow elastication at the waist.
Round, braided shoulder bag with an embroidered motif. Tie fastening with wooden beads on the ends. Unlined. Width 5 cm, diameter 24 cm.
Dungarees in stretch denim with detachable, adjustable straps with buttons at the top, a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and slim legs.
Shirt in an airy, patterned Tencel™ lyocell and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, French front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short, 5-pocket skirt in washed stretch denim with studs at the sides, a zip fly and button, and raw-edge hem.
Shoes in a cotton weave with elastic gores in the sides and a loop at the back. Fabric linings and insoles and fluted soles.

Set with a dress and pair of leggings in soft organic cotton. Denim dress with short, flounced sleeves, a gathered yoke at the front and wrapover with a fastening at the back. Leggings in patterned jersey with an elasticated waist.
Pull-on trousers in cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and fake welt back pockets. Tapered legs with decorative seams and elasticated hems.
Suede biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with a press-stud. Zipped front pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Ankle-length dungarees in a viscose weave with narrow, tie-top straps. Seam at the waist with a drawstring that ties at the sides, and straight-cut legs that taper gently to the hem.
Hi-tops in imitation leather with elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front and a small loop at the back. Faux shearling linings and fluted rubber soles. Height of soles 2 cm.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill made from a cotton blend with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Metal chain necklace decorated with pearly plastic beads in various shapes. Adjustable length 43-50 cm.
Elastic hairband with an appliqué at the front and elastication at the back.
Lace thong briefs with a low waist, lined gusset,wide sides and string back.
Ballet pumps in woven fabric with broderie anglaise. Concealed elastication at the heels, fabric linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, 3/4-length, cuffed sleeves and a seam at the waist. Unlined.
Shaftless socks in a fine-knit cotton blend with elasticated tops. The socks are designed to be hidden inside your shoes.
Boxer shorts in cotton jersey with short legs, an elasticated waist and lined front.
Top and leggings with a print motif. Longer top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. Leggings in cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Jacket in a soft, checked weave with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap, a gently tapered waist and long sleeves. No fasteners. Lined.
Fitted top in a fine rib knit with long sleeves and a ribbed neckline.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jumper in a soft cable knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Slightly longer, stocking-stitched back.
Shirt in a checked cotton weave with worn details. Turn-down collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and raw, frayed cuffs and hem.
Jumper for a dog in a jacquard knit with a ribbed collar and ribbing around the front legs and at the back.
Sleeveless blouse in a lightly crinkled weave. Small, frilled, smocked collar with a V-shaped opening and ties at the front. Lined.
A pair of twisted hoop earrings made from recycled zinc.
Thick socks in a fine-knit wool blend with foldover tops.
Sleeveless dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
T-shirt in printed jersey.
Short dress woven in a crisp cotton blend with 3/4-length dolman sleeves with elasticated cuffs. Elasticated seam at the waist and side pockets. Unlined.
